      • setBoundsBias

        public void setBoundsBias(LatLngBounds boundsBias)
        Set the PlaceAutocompleteView's bounds bias. If not set, you should request android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION in your manifest so that the map will be centered on the user's current location. If this permission is not present results will not be limited by any bounds.
        Parameters:
        boundsBias -
